Module c482performanceassessment
Package c482performanceassessment.controllers

Class MainFormController

  • java.lang.Object
    • c482performanceassessment.controllers.BaseFormController
      • c482performanceassessment.controllers.MainFormController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable
    public class MainFormController
extends BaseFormController
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    This class is responsible for handling all functionality for the main-form scene. FUTURE ENHANCEMENT - Could add the ability to resize the window and have the scenes be responsive to the size change.
    Author:
    Brady Bassett

      • onPartAdd

        private void onPartAdd​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
                throws java.io.IOException
        Switches the scene to the part-form scene and changes part-form title to "Add". RUNTIME ERROR - Was unable to load in the part-form.fxml file. Fixed this by recreating the part-form.fxml file ensuring that it was using the correct form of javafx.
        Parameters:
        event - ActionEvent that provides the main stage declared in main
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the part-form.fxml file is not found
